metadata.title: MOLAR ABSORPTIVITY AND A;$ VALUES FOR PROTEINS AT SELECTED WAVELENGTHS OF THE ULTRAVIOLET AND VISIBLE REGIONS-XVIII

abstract.text: A table of molar absorptivity and Ai:m values for more than 180 proteins is given. The conditions
used to obtain these values and references to the original literature are also'given.

body_text.text: The molar absorptivi'ty and Ai?m values for m.ore than 180 proteins and the conditions under which these values were obtained are listed in Table 1 . Additional pertinent information can be found in the footnotes to Table 1 . This paper is part of a continuing compilation of protein data. [

Library of the Downstate Medical Center College of Medicine has been the major source of ali publications examined. What was not. available in the library was obtained for me from othtr libraries by our Inter:Library Loan service. I should like to thank the librarians.for their most useful and continuing assistance.
